casebody.data:
ADVOCACY GROUP
v.
TOWN OF LONG BEACH. No. 559A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 3, 2006. Roger Lee Edwards, Oak Island, for Town of Long Beach. V. Lori Fuller, Assistant Attorney General, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th day of December 2005 by Plaintiff for Extension of time to File New Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiff (Property Rights Advocacy Group) shall have up to and including the 13th day of January 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of January 2006."
